channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car park has no lighting at all working, 14th October
item.description:
Lower high street car park has no lighting, it’s been like it for over a month please can this be done asap Thankyou
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thornton Mews, St Paul’s, Cheltenham

item.title: Exposed metalwork of broken parking restriction sign, 13th October
item.description:
Parking restriction sign was removed after damage earlier this year leaving exposed remains. You put a bollard over it. ST contractors moved and used the bollard at a recent road closure. When they reopened the road they took the bollard away The remains are a danger to dogs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sussex Gardens, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeatedly reported, 13th October

item.title: There are multiple potholes in this area and when you drive into the avenue, around the middle of the road, ans to the right, and all of the way up until around halfway up.the road., 13th October
item.description:
Shelley road before turning into Shelley Avenue - is generally in poor repair with multiple potholes. I've seen repairs done twice now and it's still in very poor. The whole of the hottom halft of the avenue, certainly on the one side needs attention. Some have been fixed, and others right next to them, left. There is still several large holes on the right near the kerb, around numbers 2 and 4.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Shelley Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
